description: The trap will be generated if the reachability status of an ENUM
server changes.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD APAPPS-MIB::apAppsENUMServerStatusChangeTrap APAPPS-MIB::apAppsENUMConfigName s EXAMPLE APAPPS-MIB::apAppsENUMServerInetAddressType i 0 APAPPS-MIB::apAppsENUMServerInetAddress s EXAMPLE APAPPS-MIB::apAppsENUMServerStatus i 2

$SNMPTRAPCMD APAPPS-MIB::apAppsENUMServerStatusChangeTrap APAPPS-MIB::apAppsENUMConfigName s EXAMPLE APAPPS-MIB::apAppsENUMServerInetAddressType i 0 APAPPS-MIB::apAppsENUMServerInetAddress s EXAMPLE APAPPS-MIB::apAppsENUMServerStatus i 0

description: The name of the enum-config element that contains this
ENUM server.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAppsENUMConfigName

description: The IP address of this ENUM server.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAppsENUMServerInetAddressType

description: The IP address of this ENUM server.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAppsENUMServerInetAddress

description: The status of this ENUM server.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAppsENUMServerStatus

description: The trap will be generated if the reachability status of a dns
server changes.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD APAPPS-MIB::apAppsDnsServerStatusChangeTrap APAPPS-MIB::apAppsDnsInterfaceName s EXAMPLE APAPPS-MIB::apAppsDnsServerInetAddressType i 0 APAPPS-MIB::apAppsDnsServerInetAddress s EXAMPLE APAPPS-MIB::apAppsDnsServerStatus i 2

$SNMPTRAPCMD APAPPS-MIB::apAppsDnsServerStatusChangeTrap APAPPS-MIB::apAppsDnsInterfaceName s EXAMPLE APAPPS-MIB::apAppsDnsServerInetAddressType i 0 APAPPS-MIB::apAppsDnsServerInetAddress s EXAMPLE APAPPS-MIB::apAppsDnsServerStatus i 0

description: The name of the dns interface that contains this
dns server.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAppsDnsInterfaceName

description: The Inet address type of this dns server.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAppsDnsServerInetAddressType

description: The IP address of this dns server.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAppsDnsServerInetAddress

description: The status of this dns server.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAppsDnsServerStatus

description: The trap will be generated when there is a disconnect
between a SBC and a CommMonitor.
The state of a CommMonitor.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apCommMonitorState

description: The trap will be generated when SBC reconnects with the
CommMonitor and resumes normal operation.

event.Summary: AP monitor collector up and operational

description: The state of a CommMonitor.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apCommMonitorState

description: The trap will be generated when acl drop ratio has
exceeded the configured threshold.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APAPPS-MIB::apAclDropOverThresholdTrap APAPPS-MIB::apAclDropType i 0 APAPPS-MIB::apAclDropCount c 9999 APAPPS-MIB::apAclDropRatio u 9999

description: ACL drop type.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAclDropType

description: ACL drop count within monitor time window.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAclDropCount

description: ACL drop ratio as permillage of current time window. Valid range 0-1000
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAclDropRatio

description: The trap will be generated when acl drop ratio has
gone below the configured threshold.

event.Summary: ACL drop ($v1) ratio fell below threshold

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APAPPS-MIB::apAclDropOverThresholdClearTrap APAPPS-MIB::apAclDropType i 0 APAPPS-MIB::apAclDropCount c 9999 APAPPS-MIB::apAclDropRatio u 9999

description: ACL drop type.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAclDropType

description: ACL drop count within monitor time window.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAclDropCount

description: ACL drop ratio as permillage of current time window. Valid range 0-1000
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAclDropRatio

description: The trap will be generated when STIR server timeout.
The STIR server name.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apStirServerName

description: The trap will be generated when any response received from a STIR server previously timeout.
The STIR server name.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apStirServerName

description: The trap will be generated if configured alarm thresholds hit for reserved NSEP sessions capacity utilisation

event.Summary: Reserved NSEP sessions capacity utilisation threshold exceeded

description: The percentage of Reserved NSEP session capacity utilization.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAppsResrvdNsepSessionCapacity

description: The trap will be generated if reserved NSEP sessions capacity utilisation becomes less than threshold

event.Summary: Reserved NSEP sessions capacity utilisation within limit

description: The percentage of Reserved NSEP session capacity utilization.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apAppsResrvdNsepSessionCapacity

description: The trap will be generated when Wancom connection
failure happens in HA pair.
Wancom interface name.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apWancomName

description: The trap will be generated when Wancom connection
again extablished for HA pair.
Wancom interface name.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apWancomName

description: The trap will be generated when an enabled push receiver fails.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APAPPS-MIB::apPushReceiverFailureTrap APAPPS-MIB::apPushReceiverAddressType i 0 APAPPS-MIB::apPushReceiverAddress s EXAMPLE APAPPS-MIB::apPushReceiverFailureReasonCode i 3 APAPPS-MIB::apPushReceiverType i 3

description: The address type of the receiver.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apPushReceiverAddressType

description: The address of the push receiver.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apPushReceiverAddress

description: The reason code for the failure.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apPushReceiverFailureReasonCode

description: The indicator of push receiver type.
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apPushReceiverType

description: The trap will be generated when the specified
traffic crosses the configured DOS thresholds.

event.Summary: Specified $v1 traffic exceeded configured DOS thresholds

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdCrossTrap APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdTraffic i 1 APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdMinorCrossed i 0 APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdMajorCrossed i 1 APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdCriticalCrossed i 0 APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdMinorCounter C 9999 APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdMajorCounter C 9999 APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdCriticalCounter C 9999

description: 1 = trusted, 2 = untrusted , 3 = ARP
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdTraffic

description: 0 = threshold not crossed, 1 = threshold crossed
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdMinorCrossed

description: 0 = threshold not crossed, 1 = threshold crossed
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdMajorCrossed

description: 0 = threshold not crossed, 1 = threshold crossed
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdCriticalCrossed

description: Counters populated, when the specified traffic
crossed the configured minor threshold percentage
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdMinorCounter

description: Counters populated, when the specified traffic
crossed the configured major threshold percentage
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdMajorCounter

description: Counters populated, when the specified traffic
crossed the configured critical threshold percentage
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdCriticalCounter

description: The clear trap will be generated when the specified
traffic had fallen back from the all configured DOS thresholds

event.Summary: Specified $v1 traffic fell below configured DOS thresholds

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdClearTrap APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdTraffic i 1 APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdMinorCounter C 9999 APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdMajorCounter C 9999 APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdCriticalCounter C 9999

description: 1 = trusted, 2 = untrusted , 3 = ARP
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdTraffic

description: Counters populated, when the specified traffic
crossed the configured minor threshold percentage
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdMinorCounter

description: Counters populated, when the specified traffic
crossed the configured major threshold percentage
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdMajorCounter

description: Counters populated, when the specified traffic
crossed the configured critical threshold percentage
variables.name: APAPPS-MIB::apDosThresholdCriticalCounter
